Title: Opposites Attract
Writer: Gianluca Ansanelli (screenplay), Gianluca Ansanelli (story), Tito Buffulini (screenplay), Tito Buffulini (story), Roberto Burchielli (screenplay), Antonello De Leo (screenplay), Mauro Graiani, Riccardo Irrera (screenplay), Paolo Logli (screenplay), Alessandro Pondi (screenplay)
Actors: Luca Argentero, Sarah Felberbaum, Giampaolo Morelli, Tommaso Ragno
Plot: She's a divorce lawyer, single mother and perpetually at war against men, he is a couple's therapist, single and not looking, they meet and collide in a bourgeois and romantic Rome...
